thread.title: Stuart Anixter
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Stuart Anixter

author: Stuart Anixter
title: Stuart Anixter
text: Frames Direct was the only place who was able to find authentic prescription lenses for my hard to find Maui Jim's. They did so for a very reasonable price. The whole process was done very quickly especially over the holidays. I really appreciated that. The glasses look great and the lenses and vision are sensational. Sarah M. there gets 10 stars in my opinion for her professionalism, friendly demeanor, and overall knowledge and assistance. I will definitely use them again.
